content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas mission:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5737,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/40744012-cd3e-4812-9cf1-2a18dd64c34c/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/40744012-cd3e-4812-9cf1-2a18dd64c34c/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"6.PNG\",\"name\":\"6.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"40744012-cd3e-4812-9cf1-2a18dd64c34c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":106},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What does that mean? Well, to adidas ‘best’ means to design, build and sell the best sports products in the world, with the best service and customer experience, and they do so in a sustainable way. \\nadidas  ‘best’  is primarily about being a credible, inclusive, and sustainable leader in the industry.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas purpose:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":874200,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cb33d748-eaa4-4da5-aee3-94d42de240f4/Screenshot - 2022-09-07T180328.943.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cb33d748-eaa4-4da5-aee3-94d42de240f4/Screenshot - 2022-09-07T180328.943.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot - 2022-09-07T180328.943.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot - 2022-09-07T180328.943.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cb33d748-eaa4-4da5-aee3-94d42de240f4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":493,\"height\":267},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":13953,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8f3da380-42b5-4dfa-bdf6-a48a38ab6bdd/Screenshot - 2022-09-07T181414.612.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8f3da380-42b5-4dfa-bdf6-a48a38ab6bdd/Screenshot - 2022-09-07T181414.612.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot - 2022-09-07T181414.612.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot - 2022-09-07T181414.612.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8f3da380-42b5-4dfa-bdf6-a48a38ab6bdd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":499,\"height\":161},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas purpose guides the way they run the company, work with partners, create products, and how engage with consumers. adidas always strive to expand the limits of human possibilities, to include and unite people in sport, and to create a more sustainable world.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas attitude:\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6468,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67d04dcc-aa42-45d2-9dc6-a7c1a263b33a/Screenshot - 2022-09-14T154528.565.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/67d04dcc-aa42-45d2-9dc6-a7c1a263b33a/Screenshot - 2022-09-14T154528.565.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Screenshot - 2022-09-14T154528.565.png\",\"name\":\"Screenshot - 2022-09-14T154528.565.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"67d04dcc-aa42-45d2-9dc6-a7c1a263b33a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":273,\"height\":110},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"adidas are rebellious optimists driven by action, with a desire to shape a better future together. They see the world of sport and culture with possibility where others only see the impossible. ‘Impossible is Nothing’ is not a tagline for adidas. By being optimistic and knowing the power of sport, they see endless possibilities to apply this power and push all people forward with action. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\nWhat makes a winning team – the 3Cs\\r:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7714,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8d7ac3d2-714c-45ca-862f-e07814c92e07/7.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8d7ac3d2-714c-45ca-862f-e07814c92e07/7.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"7.PNG\",\"name\":\"7.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8d7ac3d2-714c-45ca-862f-e07814c92e07\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":765,\"height\":121},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At adidas, they have a winning culture. But to win, physical power is not enough. Just like athletes also adidas employees need mental strength in their game. They foster that athlete’s mindset through a set of behaviors that they want to see in their people and that are at the core of their unique company culture – the 3Cs:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CONFIDENCE \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field, to reach higher. For adidas, confidence means to acknowledge that they don’t have all the answers but are willing to take risks and try new things. And failures are part of learning – it helps to improve.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"COLLABORATION\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Every elite athlete relies on partners: coaches, teammates, and nutritionists. adidas too, know that we are stronger together. Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue, inclusiveness, and trust in each other’s abilities and talents.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Being the best sports company in the world takes \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CREATIVITY\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors’ training plans and strategies. adidas have to be open to new ideas, explore, gain an edge and stand out in order to succeed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
